entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 50 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
